title: My friend lost my promos
body: My friend starting inting in the bot lane. I did starting flaming him and saying hateful things, but i strongly disagree with my punishment. I got a 14 day ban for saying hateful things.  This is my first ban and please un ban or make it shorter.'

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Liltacodude,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=3VqlAXBI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-25T08:46:56.085+0000)
>
> you are a good friend

his "friend" started inting first.

>I got a 14 day ban for saying hateful things. This is my first ban and please un ban or make it shorter.

Even if it is your first time being banned, hate speech is usually escalated directly to a 14-day ban because Riot has a zero tolerance policy against it. The only time Riot ever reverses a ban is when a player is banned in error.
